displayName.french: Survivez à la Ferme familiale des Greene
displayName.spanish: Sobrevive en la Granja de la familia Greene
displayName.brazilian: Sobreviva à fazenda da família Greene

description.english: Clear out the barn of walkers and reach Dale’s RV safely.
description.german: Säubere die Scheune von Streunern und erreiche sicher Dales Wohnmobil.
description.french: Éliminez les marcheurs dans la grange et rejoignez le camping-car de Dale en sécurité.
description.italian: Elimina tutti gli erranti nel fienile e raggiungi il camper di Dale.
description.spanish: Elimina a todos los caminantes del granero y regresa sano y salvo a la caravana de Dale.
description.russian: Зачистить сарай от ходячих и добраться до фургона Дейла.
description.brazilian: Elimine os errantes do celeiro e chegue ao trailer de Dale em segurança.

description.english: Successfully complete Meriwether County Correctional Facility
description.german: Schließe die "Meriwether County Justizvollzugsanstalt" erfolgreich ab
description.french: Terminez avec succès l'Établissement correctionnel de Meriwether
description.italian: Supera il livello del penitenziario della contea di Meriwether.
description.spanish: Completa con éxito el Centro penitenciario del condado Meriwether
description.brazilian: Conclua o Centro Penitenciário Municipal de Meriwether

description.english: Allow Michonne to deal with the Governor then successfully escape Woodbury.
description.german: Erlaube Michonne, die Angelegenheit mit dem Gouverneur zu klären, und fliehe dann erfolgreich aus Woodbury.
description.french: Laissez Michonne s'occuper du Gouverneur puis échappez-vous de Woodbury.
description.italian: Permetti a Michonne di occuparsi del Governatore e poi scappa da Woodbury.
description.spanish: Deja que Michonne se encuentre con el gobernador y luego huye de Woodbury
description.russian: Позволить Мишон разобраться с Губернатором, а затем бежать из Вудбери.
description.brazilian: Deixe Michonne lidar com o Governador e, em seguida, fuja de Woodbury.

displayName.german: Kein Stein bleibt auf dem anderen

description.english: Successfully guide Carl to safety from Alexandria.
description.german: Führe Carl erfolgreich aus Alexandria in Sicherheit.
description.french: Parvenez à mener Carl en sécurité depuis Alexandria.
description.italian: Accompagna Carl da Alexandria a un luogo sicuro.
description.spanish: Saca a Carl de Alexandría y llévalo a un lugar seguro
description.russian: Сопроводить Карла из Александрии в безопасное место.
description.brazilian: Guie Carl de Alexandria a um lugar seguro.

description.english: Seek out all of the 24 volumes of The Walking Dead.
description.german: Finde alle 24 Bänder von The Walking Dead.
description.french: Cherchez les 24 volumes de Walking Dead.
description.italian: Recupera i 24 volumi di The Walking Dead.
description.spanish: Busca los 24 volúmenes de The Walking Dead
description.brazilian: Procure todos os 24 volumes de The Walking Dead.

description.english: Complete any level without having any survivor being downed.
description.german: Schließe jedes Level ab, ohne dass ein Überlebender stirbt.
description.french: Terminez un niveau sans qu'un seul survivant ne meure.
description.italian: Completa un livello senza perdere sopravvissuti.
description.spanish: Completa cualquier nivel sin que caiga ningún superviviente
description.russian: Пройти любой уровень, не потеряв ни одного выжившего.
description.brazilian: Conclua qualquer nível sem nenhuma baixa nos sobreviventes.

description.english: Have Rick kill 100 walkers using any type of weaponry.
description.german: Lass Rick 100 Streuner mit beliebigen Waffen töten.
description.french: Faites tuer 100 marcheurs à Rick avec n'importe quel genre d'arme.
description.italian: Fai uccidere 100 erranti a Rick con qualsiasi arma.
description.spanish: Haz que Rick mate 100 caminantes con cualquier arma.
description.russian: Рик должен убить 100 ходячих любым оружием.
description.brazilian: Faça Rick matar 100 caminhantes com qualquer tipo de arma.

description.english: Kill 50 walkers using Melee weaponry only.
description.german: Töte 50 Streuner nur mit Nahkampfwaffen.
description.french: Tuez 50 marcheurs en utilisant seulement des armes de mêlée.
description.italian: Uccidi 50 erranti usando solo armi da mischia.
description.spanish: Mata 50 caminantes usando solo armas de Refriega.
description.brazilian: Mate 50 errantes usando somente armas corpo a corpo.

description.english: Obtain at least one type of the following weapons; melee, pistol, rifle, machine gun and shotgun.
description.german: Beschaffe mindestens einen Typ der folgenden Waffen: Nahkampf, Pistole, Gewehr, Maschinengewehr und Schrotflinte.
description.french: Obtenez au moins une arme pour chacun de ces genres : mêlée, pistolet, fusil, mitrailleuse et fusil de chasse.
description.italian: Ottieni almeno uno dei seguenti tipi di armi: da mischia, pistola, carabina, mitra, fucile.
description.spanish: Consigue al menos un tipo de las siguientes armas: refriega, pistola, rifle, ametralladora y escopeta.
description.russian: Получить хотя бы один из следующих видов оружия: холодное, пистолет, винтовку, автомат и ружье.
description.brazilian: Consiga pelo menos um tipo das seguintes armas: corpo a corpo, pistola, rifle, metralhadora e espingarda.

description.english: Have walkers devour the cooked meat item.
description.german: Bringe Streuner dazu, das gekochte Fleischgericht zu fressen.
description.french: Faites en sorte que des marcheurs dévorent l'objet Viande cuisinée.
description.italian: Fai mangiare la carne cotta agli erranti.
description.spanish: Haz que los caminantes devoren la comida cocinada.
description.brazilian: Faça os errantes devorarem o item carne cozida.

displayName.english: All I Want Is My Stereo!
displayName.german: Alles, was ich will, ist meine Anlage!
displayName.brazilian: Só quero meu aparelho de som!

description.english: Use the Radio distraction item.
description.german: Benutze den Funkwellen-Störsender.
description.french: Utilisez l'objet de distraction Radio.
description.italian: Usa la radio come diversivo.
description.spanish: Usa la Radio para distraerles.
description.brazilian: Use o rádio como item de distração.

description.english: Have Rick wear the riot gear and walker make up kit at any time.
description.german: Lass Rick die Kampfausrüstung und das Streuner-Verkleidungsset tragen.
description.french: Faites porter à Rick l'équipement anti-émeute et le kit de maquillage de marcheur à n'importe quel moment.
description.italian: Fai indossare l'equipaggiamento antisommossa e il travestimento da errante a Rick.
description.spanish: Haz que Rick lleve el equipo antidisturbios y el kit de maquillaje de caminante en cualquier momento.
description.russian: В нужное время на Рике должно быть спецснаряжение или камужляж под ходячего.
description.brazilian: Faça o Rick vestir o equipamento de multidão e o kit de maquiagem de errantes a qualquer momento.

description.english: Spend 200 credits across any of the level’s vendor points.
description.german: Gib 200 Credits an beliebigen Verkaufsstellen des Levels aus.
description.french: Dépensez 200 crédits dans n'importe quel point de vente de niveau.
description.italian: Spendi un totale di 200 crediti fra tutti i punti vendita.
description.spanish: Gasta 200 créditos en cualquier punto de venta del nivel.
description.russian: Потратить 200 кредитов в любых торговых точках на уровне.
description.brazilian: Gaste 200 créditos em qualquer ponto de venda do nível.

description.english: Craft all extensions across ALL of the available melee and gun weapons.
description.german: Stelle alle Erweiterungen ALLER verfügbaren Nahkampf- und Schusswaffen her.
description.french: Fabriquez toutes les extensions de TOUTES les armes de mêlée et à feu disponibles.
description.italian: Crea tutte le estensioni di TUTTE le armi da mischia e da fuoco disponibili.
description.spanish: Fabrica todas las extensiones de entre todas las armas de fuego y de refriega disponibles.
description.russian: Сделать все дополнительные приспособления для ВСЕХ доступных видов холодного и огнестрельного оружия.
description.brazilian: Produza todas as extensões em TODAS as armas corpo a corpo e de fogo.

description.english: Complete any level within 10 days.
description.german: Schließe ein beliebiges Level innerhalb von 10 Tagen ab.
description.french: Terminez un niveau en 10 jours.
description.italian: Completa un livello entro 10 giorni.
description.spanish: Completa cualquier nivel en menos de 10 días.
description.brazilian: Conclua qualquer nível dentro de 10 dias.

description.english: Get through a day from 7:00 to 00:00 without any increase to the threat level on Meriwether.
description.german: Stehe einen Tag von 7:00 Uhr bis 00:00 Uhr durch, ohne die Gefahrenstufe in Meriwether zu erhöhen.
description.french: Passez une journée de 7h à 00h sans aucune augmentation du niveau de menace dans Meriwether.
description.italian: Trascorri un giorno dalle 7:00 alle 00:00 senza far salire il livello di pericolo di Meriwether.
description.spanish: Completa un día de 07:00 a 00:00 en Meriwether sin que el nivel de amenaza aumente.
description.russian: Прожить день с 07:00 до 00:00 без повышения уровня угрозы в тюрьме Меривезер.
description.brazilian: Passe um dia das 7h00 às 00h00 sem nenhum aumento no nível de ameaça em Meriwether.

displayName.brazilian: De volta do mundo dos mortos

description.english: Finish the tutorial.
description.german: Beende das Tutorial.
description.french: Finissez le niveau didacticiel.
description.italian: Completa il tutorial.
description.spanish: Acaba el nivel tutorial.
description.brazilian: Conclua o nível de tutorial.

description.english: Collect half of the bonus items.
description.german: Sammle 12 Bände von The Walking Dead.
description.french: Collectez 12 volumes de Walking Dead.
description.italian: Recupera 12 volumi di The Walking Dead.
description.spanish: Encuentra 12 volúmenes de The Walking Dead
description.brazilian: Colete 12 volumes de The Walking Dead.

description.english: Kill a Walker with a Trophy
description.german: Töte einen Streuner mit einer Trophäe
description.french: Tuez un marcheur avec un trophée
description.italian: Uccidi un errante con un trofeo.
description.spanish: Mata un caminante con un trofeo
description.brazilian: Mate um errante com um troféu

description.english: Get 3 Stars on The Defense of Alexandria (Survival)
description.german: Erreiche 3 Sterne bei der Verteidigung Alexandrias. (Überleben)
description.french: Obtenez 3 étoiles pendant La défense d'Alexandria. (Survie)
description.italian: Ottieni 3 stelle nel livello La difesa di Alexandria. (Sopravvivenza)
description.spanish: Consigue 3 estrellas en La defensa de Alexandría. (Supervivencia)
description.brazilian: Obtenha 3 estrelas em A Defesa de Alexandria. (Sobrevivência)

description.english: Get 3 Stars on The Invasion of Woodbury (Survival)
description.german: Erreiche 3 Sterne bei der Invasion von Woodbury. (Überleben)
description.french: Obtenez 3 étoiles pendant L'invasion de Woodbury. (Survie)
description.italian: Ottieni 3 stelle nel livello L'invasione di Woodbury. (Sopravvivenza)
description.spanish: Consigue 3 estrellas en La invasión de Woodbury. (Supervivencia)
description.brazilian: Obtenha 3 estrelas em A Invasão de Woodbury. (Sobrevivência)

description.english: Get 3 Stars on The Attack on Meriwether (Survival)
description.german: Erreiche 3 Sterne beim Angriff auf Meriwether. (Überleben)
description.french: Obtenez 3 étoiles pendant L'attaque sur Meriwether. (Survie)
description.italian: Ottieni 3 stelle nel livello L'attacco a Meriwether. (Sopravvivenza)
description.spanish: Consigue 3 estrellas en El ataque a Meriwether. (Supervivencia)
description.brazilian: Obtenha 3 estrelas em O Ataque em Meriwether. (Sobrevivência)

description.english: Kill the Governor (Survival)
description.german: Tötet den Gouverneur. (Überleben)
description.french: Tuez le Gouverneur. (Survie)
description.italian: Uccidi il Governatore. (Sopravvivenza)
description.spanish: Mata al gobernador. (Supervivencia)
description.brazilian: Mate o Governador. (Sobrevivência)

description.english: Survive until wave 17 on any level. (Survival)
description.german: Überlebe bis Welle 17 auf einem beliebigen Level. (Überleben)
description.french: Survivez jusqu'à la vague 17 dans n'importe quel niveau. (Survie)
description.italian: Sopravvivi fino alla 17ª ondata di un livello qualsiasi. (Sopravvivenza)
description.spanish: Sobrevive hasta la oleada 17 en cualquier nivel. (Supervivencia)
description.russian: Дожить до волны 17 на любом уровне. (Выживание)
description.brazilian: Sobreviva até a leva 17 em qualquer nível. (Sobrevivência)
